channel.title: Running Server on Linux
channel.description:
Ok so my windows Run.bat is: [code]@echo off title BoomScape cd ../build echo [ BoomScape ] - Engine Started echo [ BoomScape ] - Flood Detect Started "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause[/code]
How can I get this to work on CentOS?
Could someone convert it or something? Thanks =)

item.title: Running Server on Linux
item.dc:creator: @dynamiteboom dynamiteboom
item.description:
@dynamiteboom wrote:

Yeah I read the last one but I couldn’t work out the other functions…
Because it runs functions from other folders etc…
Please could someone convert it please?

Read full topic

item.title: Running Server on Linux
item.dc:creator: @dynamiteboom dynamiteboom
item.description:
@dynamiteboom wrote:

Ok so my windows Run.bat is:

@echo off title BoomScape cd ../build echo [ BoomScape ] - Engine Started echo [ BoomScape ] - Flood Detect Started "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause

How can I get this to work on CentOS?

Could someone convert it or something?
Thanks =)
